title: SAW A HACKER TODAY
body:
like most games this guy had a wall hack. 

he literally just went right through the walls. could just walk away from me right through the wall.  Please fix this riot, other games have wall hacks and it ruins the game.  Hopefully you can stop this player from doing this and ruining the game.

replies.body: {{champion:141}}  exists. Where's your lol champion wheel toy. If you want a real wall hack, there's a mobi boots bug on Alistair where you can stand on the void of nothing.
he's called kanye and he goes where he pleases.
right. next thing your gonna tell me he can go invulnerable for a few seconds too and regain tons of health for free.
I mean he can with his ult(if he is red form).
go to memes and games if you wanna make jokes, maybe rework them to be funny too

> [{quoted}](name=Friendly Ram,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6j34rLi0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-04T03:43:20.928+0000)
>
> he's called kanye and he goes where he pleases.

{{champion:36}} goes where he pleases though. {{item:3070}}
fine, mundo goes where he pleases and the sissy comes where he pleases.

Gr8 shitpost

If you want an actual wallhack, look at the taliyah bug.
